name: SpacetimeDB
title: spacetimedb.com
shortDescription: SpacetimeDB combines a relational database with a server, allowing direct client connections. This eliminates the need for middle-layer servers like Docker or Kubernetes, simplifying infrastructure for developers. It's ideal for developers building multiplayer games, such as BitCraft, which uses SpacetimeDB for all backend needs including game logic and player data management.
pros: Supports ACID transactions and SQL-style queries
Designed for low latency and high throughput
cons: Limited to database and server functionalities
Potentially less flexible for non-gaming applications
